title: Geometry: Angles and Classification

vocab.definition: The space between two lines that meet at a point
The point where two lines meet to form an angle
An angle that measures exactly 90 degrees

teachingNotes: Use angle manipulatives and protractors to measure angles. Help students identify different types of angles in real-world objects. Practice drawing and classifying angles.
